channel.title: Ralph Lauren on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ralph Lauren on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ralph Lauren’s Beloved Mascot Pulls Off Art Heist in Fashion Brand’s First Animated Film
item.description: A teaser for ’The Polo Bear Chronicles: Operation Black Tie’ dropped Monday, with the full animated short film scheduled to debut Thursday.
